dompe lama niwasaye dasa was samaruma wenuwen idi karana lada godanagili thuna pasugiyada wiwrutha karana ladi.lama niwasa newasikagaraya, dana shala mandiraya ha nana kamara paddhathiya mita athulath wini.jyeshta kathikacharini sudharma gnyanasiri mahathmiya athulu parithyagashilin wisin rupiyal laksha pahaka mudalak waya kota lama niwasa newasikagarayada sampath bankuwe wanija naya anshaya magin rupiyal laksha pahaka mudalak waya kota dana shala mandirayada kolambaa loyid rejistar aayathanaya magin rupiyal laksha hathaka mudalak waya kota nana kamara paddhathiya da idikaranu laba thibe.mehidi basnahira palath pariwasa ha lama rakshaka sewa komasaris ji. pi. di. somarathna mahatha wisin lama niwasa newasikagaraya wiwrutha karanu labu athara shala mandiraya wiwrutha karanu labuwe sampath bankuwe wanija naya anshaye sambandhatha kalamanakaru chinthaka da silwa mahatha wisini.me nimiththen sinadi siwu koralaye pradhana adhikarana sanghanayaka dandeniye jinawansha nahimiyange pradhanathwayen pawathi uthsawa sabhawedi basnahira palath pariwasa ha lama rakshaka sewa kalamanakaru ji. pi. di. somarathna mahatha pawasuwe samajaye wagakima daruwan raka gena poshanaya kirima wana bawath me bharadura karya bharaya itu kirimata samajaya apa kapa wiya yuthu bawathya.ema lama niwasaye adhyaksha denagama wipulasara himi kiya sitiye adata me lama niwasayata wasara 10 k sapirena bawath mul awadiyedi meya kada kappal kara damimata athamun uthsaha kala bawath namuth hoda sithakin meya aarambha kala nisa eya sarthaka wu bawathya.dompe pradeshiya shasanarakshaka mandalaye lekhakadhikari palugama dipananda himiyoda lama niwasaye kalamanakaru dabliw.
loku gal dekak wenuwen randuwena japanaya ha dakunu ko...
